metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items rejected
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items rejected") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items incomplete
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items incomplete") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items blocked for delivery
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items blocked for delivery") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items incomplete for delivery
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items incomplete for delivery") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery created after planned material availability
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivery created after planned material availability") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items incomplete for goods movement
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items incomplete for goods movement") * 100

metrics.name: Goods issue posted after planned goods issue date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Goods issue posted after planned goods issue date") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items blocked for billing
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items blocked for billing") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items incomplete for billing
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items incomplete for billing") * 100

metrics.name: Invoice posted after planned billing date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Invoice posted after planned billing date") * 100

metrics.name: Customer FI-AR items cleared
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Customer FI-AR items cleared") * 100

metrics.name: Intercompany FI-AR items cleared
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Intercompany FI-AR items cleared") * 100

metrics.name: Intercompany FI-AP items cleared
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Intercompany FI-AP items cleared") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Delivery items created") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Delivery items created")

metrics.name: Goods issue posted (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Goods issue posted") * 100

metrics.name: Goods issue posted (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Goods issue posted")

metrics.name: Customer invoice items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Customer invoice items created") * 100

metrics.name: Customer invoice items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Customer invoice items created")

metrics.name: Customer FI-AR items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Customer FI-AR items created") * 100

metrics.name: Customer FI-AR items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Customer FI-AR items created")

metrics.name: Intercompany documents created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Intercompany documents created") * 100

metrics.name: Intercompany documents created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Intercompany documents created")

metrics.name: Intercompany FI-AR items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Intercompany FI-AR items created") * 100

metrics.name: Intercompany FI-AR items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Intercompany FI-AR items created")

metrics.name: Intercompany FI-AP items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Intercompany FI-AP items created") * 100

metrics.name: Intercompany FI-AP items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Intercompany FI-AP items created")

metrics.name: Create sales order item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create sales order item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create outbound delivery item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create outbound delivery item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods issue
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods issue')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create customer invoice
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create customer invoice')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create customer FI-AR item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create customer FI-AR item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Clear customer FI-AR item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Clear customer FI-AR item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create intercompany invoice
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create intercompany invoice')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create intercompany FI-AR item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create intercompany FI-AR item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create intercompany FI-AP item

metrics.name: Clear intercompany FI-AP item
